channel.title: What do you think the best video editor is?
channel.description:
What do you think the best video editor out there is?
I'm not talking for any specific criteria but video editing in general. Comparison between software such as Adobe After Effects, Sony Vegas, cinema 4d etc., are presented to us as some what decent but is there one which would just suite a normal video editing environment for example I've seen many people editing in after effects but rendering in Vegas? Bearing in mind computer specifications.

item.title: What do you think the best video editor is?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Premier pro always used the gpu better than vegas did for me

Read full topic

item.title: What do you think the best video editor is?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:17, topic:515296”]I’m a little obsessed with movie making. Once I get a better computer this list is going go a whole lot bigger

65dce8ba5891d279e07ac6af16d442d5.png700×96

Few projects that I am working on

OT: I love to use After Effects, you cant beat it![/quote]I basically have all of these too. I prefer Sony Vegas for basic editing and putting clips and sounds together, but after effects is fun solely for effects like intros or outros.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you think the best video editor is?
item.dc:creator: @RankTex RankTex
item.description:
@RankTex wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:15, topic:515296”][quote author=RankTex link=topic=633548.msg4316031#msg4316031 date=1371498582]
I have used:
Windows Movie Maker
Sony Vegas PRO
Adobe After Effects
iMovie
Sony Platinum (rip off of Vegas)
Camtasia Studio

My favorite is Sony Vegas Pro. I have a way I can use that to make the same effects as AE, and they are pretty decent, IMA!

I like using Camtasia aswell, but for my RS PK vids, what I did is use Camtasia studio, convert it to a file where I can edit it in Vegas, and I’d use Camtasia then Vegas for a pretty kick-ass video.
[/quote]

got any clips i can see?[/quote]

I am sorry, I don’t. I deleted all my RuneScape videos when I started coding RSPS. I will record some clips from my server pking, and ill edit those, and ill send you the link to my youtube then, ok?

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think the best video editor is?

Windows Movie Maker

Sony Platinum (rip off of Vegas)
Camtasia Studio

My favorite is Sony Vegas Pro. I have a way I can use that to make the same effects as AE, and they are pretty decent, IMA!

I like using Camtasia aswell, but for my RS PK vids, what I did is use Camtasia studio, convert it to a file where I can edit it in Vegas, and I’d use Camtasia then Vegas for a pretty kick-ass video.[/quote]

got any clips i can see?

item.title: What do you think the best video editor is?
item.dc:creator: @RankTex RankTex
item.description:
@RankTex wrote:

I have used:
Windows Movie Maker
Sony Vegas PRO
Adobe After Effects
iMovie
Sony Platinum (rip off of Vegas)
Camtasia Studio

My favorite is Sony Vegas Pro. I have a way I can use that to make the same effects as AE, and they are pretty decent, IMA!

I like using Camtasia aswell, but for my RS PK vids, what I did is use Camtasia studio, convert it to a file where I can edit it in Vegas, and I’d use Camtasia then Vegas for a pretty kick-ass video.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you think the best video editor is?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

KroniKz_:

I’ve made a lot of cool stuff in after affects. I think it’s more noob friendly than Sony Vegas… I don’t have much experience with it. I prefer After Effects.

Personal preference, imo after effects looks like rocket science lol
